## DynamicRingBuffer.(constructor)

Create a dynamic ring buffer with auto-resize capability

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(initialCapacity: number, options?: {
        maxCapacity?: number;
        minCapacity?: number;
        autoResize?: boolean;
        resizeThreshold?: number;
        shrinkThreshold?: number;
        resizeFactor?: number;
        resizeCooldown?: number;
    });
```
